Plot: A young girl flees her hometown and arrives in the Australian Alps, where new experiences help her learn the differences between sex and love.
Title: Somersault
Actors: Abbie Cornish, Damian de Montemas, Olivia Pigeot, Alex Babic
tomatoConsensus: A poignant coming-of-age tale marked by a breakout lead performance from Abbie Cornish and a successful directorial debut from Cate Shortland.
